findings.title: Incorrect logic when burning and minting tokens
findings.description: The `mint()` function does not increment the `totalSupply` variable, and the `burn()` function does not decrement it, which is inconsistent with the ERC-20 specification.

findings.title: Unclear constants
findings.description: The usage of unclear constants such as `30 * 10**18` without proper explanation can lead to confusion and potential errors.
